short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The easiest yet powerful Web Scraper Chrome extensions

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is a Web Scraper, it will collect all the data you like from a website and it put on CSV file.
Just click on the elements of the page you want to scrape, reopen the extension a click "Start scrape" ... just that
